File libsrc/libmath/ftoa.c

Public Functions

ftoa 
 void ftoa(double f,
           int ndeci,
           int fixLength,
           char *s,
           int len)
Convert a double to a character string.

Parameters:
f - (input) floating point number to convert to characters.
ndeci - (input) desired # of digits to the right of the decimal.
fixLength - (input) if 1, the trailing '0's or '.' are removed.
s - (output) character string representing f.
len - (input) The length of s.
